titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the further discovery of the late horrid design against His Majesties sacred person and government
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the twenty seventh day of November, 1678. In the thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
